channel.title: Instinct Pk
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/6253/rlthread.png[/img]
Instinct PK is back after been long awaited. Gil has coded the server from scratch and it's time to get back all of our old players who loved and enjoyed Instinct PK[/CENTER]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yOfKrTsJR6k&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[SIZE=5]100% UPTIME[/SIZE]
Instinct PK - [url=http://play.instinct-pk.com]http://play.instinct-pk.com[/url] Play - [url=http://www.instinct-pk.com/forums/forum.php]http://www.instinct-pk.com/forums/forum.php[/url] Forums
Features - Great Active Staff - Great Pking Community - PVP Armour, Godswords and Bandos - Fully Working Skilling & Combat System - Npcs/Monster locations same as on Runescape - Starter Pack For New Players - Stable Economy & Active Market - Old School Pking - Fully working clan chat - Barrows - Active, Friendly Community Forum - Random PK Points With Shop Rewards - Commands - Grand Exchange - 100% Instant Switching - XP Counter - Staff of Light - Dragon Defender - Slayer Helm
Images
[img]http://i.minus.com/iGD2Gq5T2Lesb.gif[/img]
This gif was made on the server, it was NOT done while hosting the server locally! Don't believe me? Come and try!
[img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/407/xzczx.png[/img]
[img]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/7649/yuitu.png[/img]
[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/6789/screenshot20120730at025.png[/img]
[img]http://a.yfrog.com/img853/4053/instinctpk0006w.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/MTpW[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/MTs1[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/MTrq[/img]
[img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/7216/screenshot20120730at032.png[/img]
Extra Information
[URL=http://"https://facebook.com/OfficialInstinctPK"]Facebook[/URL] [URL=http://"https://twitter.com/#!/InstinctPK"]Twitter[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=OfficialInstinctPK"]YouTube[/URL]

item.title: Instinct Pk
item.dc:creator: @Tom_Clunge Tom_Clunge
item.description:
@Tom_Clunge wrote:

Soulcist:

No, I’m more bothered with the forums, the forums are the first-impression and thus these forums are a downhill from there for me, take it or leave it though, your choice.

The forums work, you can chat there and find out information. That’s what they are there for, not to have perfect user groups…

Read full topic

No, I’m more bothered with the forums, the forums are the first-impression and thus these forums are a downhill from there for me, take it or leave it though, your choice.

item.title: Instinct Pk
item.dc:creator: @Tom_Clunge Tom_Clunge
item.description:
@Tom_Clunge wrote:

[quote=“Bob Instinct, post:4, topic:452356”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=555235.msg4065275#msg4065275 date=1343827441]
The forums look like throw-up, and the usergroup legend is dumb. I’d recommend using another theme, and changing the usergroup legend as a start.
[/quote]

There is no usergroup legend [/quote]

We are more bothered about in game than the forums

Read full topic

item.title: Instinct Pk
item.dc:creator: @Bob_Instinct Bob Instinct
item.description:
@Bob_Instinct wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:7, topic:452356”][quote author=Bob Instinct link=topic=555235.msg4065298#msg4065298 date=1343830430]

There is no usergroup legend

There is one at the bottom, here is a picture: http://puu.sh/NDQf

You mean dds lenged? LOL that is someone his name on the forums, its not a usergroup. The usergroups are the ones with the icons and registered users.
[/quote]

He means legend as in a key. The Usergroup Legend is the list that shows the usergroups.[/quote]

Ah i see, never used vBullitin.

Read full topic

item.title: Instinct Pk
item.dc:creator: @rarffen rarffen
item.description:
@rarffen wrote:

Very fun server with a great combat system, as well as skilling. Also there are lots of bosses for those of you that enjoy the PvM aspect of runescape.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Bob_Instinct Bob Instinct
item.description:

This is the best server i’ve ever played!
Hope alot of other people would experience the same fun as me while playing Instinct PK!

item.title: Instinct Pk
item.dc:creator: @Tom_Clunge Tom_Clunge
item.description:
@Tom_Clunge wrote:

[CENTER]

Instinct PK is back after been long awaited. Gil has coded the server from scratch and it’s time to get back all of our old players who loved and enjoyed Instinct PK[/CENTER]

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yOfKrTsJR6k&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

[SIZE=5]100% UPTIME[/SIZE]

Instinct PK

  • http://play.instinct-pk.com Play
  • http://www.instinct-pk.com/forums/forum.php Forums

Features

  • Great Active Staff
  • Great Pking Community
  • PVP Armour, Godswords and Bandos
  • Fully Working Skilling & Combat System
  • Npcs/Monster locations same as on Runescape
  • Starter Pack For New Players
  • Stable Economy & Active Market
  • Old School Pking
  • Fully working clan chat
  • Barrows
  • Active, Friendly Community Forum
  • Random PK Points With Shop Rewards
  • Commands
  • Grand Exchange
  • 100% Instant Switching
  • XP Counter
  • Staff of Light
  • Dragon Defender
  • Slayer Helm

Images

This gif was made on the server, it was NOT done while hosting the server locally! Don’t believe me? Come and try!
